'''Daisy Boffin, née Baggins''', was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Daisy was the daughter of [[Dudo Baggins]], born in {{SR|1350}}.<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref> She married [[Griffo Boffin]] and had a child, [[Tosto Boffin]] in {{SR|1388}}. They were all guests at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>

==Etymology==
[[Daisy]], a flower name, derives from [[Old English]] ''dæges eage'' "day's eye".<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names"</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2007 ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
: Daisy Boffin normally appears in [[Bywater]] as a vendor with no unique lines. During the annual Yule Festival, she is found at the [[Party Tree]] where she asks the player for assistance with celebration preparations.
